data.actual_result: discord does crash if you try to download something
data.expected_result: Discord to check if the service is running, and if not running, show an error message
data.short_description: when the download manager service is disabled, discord does crash if you try to download something, rather than checking if all necessary process are active (Possible only with OS 4.x)
data.steps_to_repro: - While something is being downloaded, find the "downloading file name" on the android notifications tab - hold it until it pops up a option to see the "App info" and select it - you should see a page with the information about the download manager - select the option to turn it off - Open Discord - find a image and click on the download button
